```
#!/bin/bash

echo '.' >> /tmp/log.txt
if [ 0 -eq $((RANDOM % 100)) ];
then /usr/bin/zenity --error --display=:0 --text "Max is responsible for these." --timeout 10 > /dev/null &
else /usr/bin/zenity "$@"
fi 
```
